title: Explosive Ambush Battle: Slaughter in the Forest - Total War: Shogun 2 Fall of the Samurai Gameplay
description:
We have another online battle in shogun 2 Total War.  This time the battle takes place in a dense forest with plenty of opportunity to ambush.  Both forces are fall of the samurai armies, and this struggle is down to the wire.  Enjoy the battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
